CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 30, 1939, pg, 4, reads: "Lovely Mermaids in Newly Formed Aqua Club - The members of the newly organized 'Y' Aqua club, who will greet the splashers in the Centre Avenue 'Y' pool, on January 1, at the season's opening party, from 2 to 5:30 p.m.  Reading, left to right: Margaret Tardy, Catherine Bolden, Delores [Dolores] McCoy, Elizabeth Lee, Norma Johnson, Jean McCoy, Ruth Sharp [Sharpe], and Genevieve Howard.  Missing from the picture are Eugenia Strolger, Beatrice Jackson, Minerva and Beatrice Williams, Vivian Miller and Thelma Lightfoot."
TitMainTitle: Aqua Club members, possibly including Catherine Bolden, Margaret Tardy, Ruth Sharpe, Jean McCoy, Dolores McCoy (Taylor), Norma Johnson, Elizabeth Lee, and Genevieve Howard, wearing bathing suits and posed at edge of Centre Avenue YMCA swimming pool
